name: LetterD
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: letter d.
des:
From the team that helped a three year old go from phonics to reading at a 8th grade level, in under one year, comes "Letter D. " 

Letter D. assesses and teaches concepts of phonics and allows early English readers to practice identifying words that start with "D." to improve phonic fluency.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
